remarks:
An irreflexive, transitive, linear relation is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) 

---

 An irreflexive, transitive, trichotomous relation is a linear ordering (in the sense of ~ df-iso ).  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
issod.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Po A ) $.
issod.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) ) -> ( x R y \/ x = y \/ y R x ) ) $.
issod $p |- ( ph -> R Or A ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
